text: Hi! I am new to HubSpot, and currently trying to figure out the extends of what a developer can do and don’t. Right now I have a client that might want a site with a knowledge base using HubSpot CMS and the service hub. From what I can spot, the customization of the knowledge base / ticketing system is quite limited. Is this correct, or can they be customized to the same extent as the CMS?
